PARK.default_example: Invalid arguments. PARK {Registration Number} {Car Color} Example - PARK KA-01-HH-1234 BLUE

LEAVE.default_example: Invalid arguments. LEAVE {slot number} Example - LEAVE 3

SLOT_NUMBERS_FOR_CARS_WITH_COLOR.default_example: Invalid arguments. SLOT_NUMBERS_FOR_CARS_WITH_COLOR {Color name} Example - SLOT_NUMBERS_FOR_CARS_WITH_COLOR WHITE

REGISTRATION_NUMBER_FOR_CARS_WITH_COLOR.default_example: Invalid arguments. REGISTRATION_NUMBER_FOR_CARS_WITH_COLOR {Color name} Example - REGISTRATION_NUMBER_FOR_CARS_WITH_COLOR WHITE

SLOT_NUMBER_FOR_REGISTRATION_NUMBER.default_example: Invalid arguments. SLOT_NUMBER_FOR_REGISTRATION_NUMBER {Registration Number} Example - SLOT_NUMBER_FOR_REGISTRATION_NUMBER KA-01-HH-1234
